meanings.definition: The way in which two or more things affect each other when they happen or exist together.
meanings.sent1: The interplays between the colors in the painting created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent2: The interplays of light and shadow added depth to the photograph.
meanings.sent3: The interplays of flavors in the dish made it a delightful culinary experience.
meanings.sent4: The interplays of emotions in the movie resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The interplays of music and dance brought the performance to life.

meanings.definition: To act on or with each other.
meanings.sent1: The characters in the play interplay with each other to tell a compelling story.
meanings.sent2: In a team sport, players must interplay effectively to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The gears in the machine interplay smoothly to ensure proper functioning.
meanings.sent4: The elements of nature interplay in a delicate balance.
meanings.sent5: Creativity and logic interplay in problem-solving situations.
